Aim for gold


Be a modern Alchemist and achieve your goals with simple automated investments in gold. You set the rules and we make the magic!

Why Alchemist?

Alchemist will help you to save in Gold and get the budget for going on holidays, making that travel trip, buying that unique gadget or simply investing for a rainy day.

Add your own goals


And let the app take you there!

Goals you can actually achieve


Investing with a purpose is powerful. Set your Goals and funding Rules and let our automatic investment methods buy you grams of Gold in small increments with zero impact in your lifestyle. Invest every day with your purchases, income or whenever you decide, and before you know it, you’ll have reached your goals.

Why Gold?

Physical gold is the ultimate storage of wealth. A stable currency, immune to inflation, bank collapses and financial risks. It shines bright in uncertain times and is one of the safest and smartest ways to invest and build wealth.

Alchemist lets you invest in 99.99% investment-grade physical gold from amounts as small as 1 milligram, and you have access to professional market rates with prices updated every 5 seconds and guaranteed low costs.

Bullet Proof Security

We’ve done the extra mile to make all your data, your money and your gold protected at all times.

Your data is secured by 256-bit encryption. That’s the same level of security as the military.

Physical Gold Redemption (soon)

Invest in physical gold and get it delivered to your door!

How to get started

Add your own goals

Your goals tailored by you, this way you can save as much money as you want for your own objectives.

Link your account

Link your account with a brand new and secure technology. With open banking you can connect your bank account, and allow us to invest your money according to your needs and funding rules.

Save and Invest automatically

With Alchemist you can just sit down and relax! Select the methods you want to use and let us help you reach your goals.

Already done?

Yes, it is that simple! Now you can monitor your goals and investments and check your progress any time.
